# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "nanoatmega328" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-gcc.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-g++.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-exceptions -fno-threadsafe-statics -fpermissive -std=gnu++11 -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto -mmcu=atmega328p")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu11 -fno-fat-lto-objects -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto -mmcu=atmega328p")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "nanoatmega328")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50101')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_NANO')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoComponents/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoComponents/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoComponents/include/DisplaySH1106")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoComponents/include/DisplaySSD1289")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoComponents/include/DisplayST7735")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoUtils/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ArduinoUtils/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Arduino_Vcc")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/DHT_nonblocking")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/UTFT")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Adafruit ST7735 and ST7789 Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Adafruit GFX Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Adafruit BusIO")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/U8g2/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/RF24Network")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/RF24")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/RF24/utility")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Low-Power")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/LoRa/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Servo/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/SD/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Ethernet/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/EEPROMEx")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/DallasTemperature")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/OneWire")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/BH1750/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/DS1307RTC")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Time")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/cores/arduino")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/variants/eightanaloginputs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/Adafruit seesaw Library")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/SD@0.0.0-alpha+sha.041f788250")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/libraries/HID/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/nanoatmega328/*.*
    )
endif()


FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
